website_summaries.verdict: These durable plastic cones are easily portable, and will stand out on the field.
pros: Available in five colors and a multicolor pack
Comes with mesh carrying bag and stand
Speed and agility drill book included
Durable and won't break if stepped on
cons: The cones may not always pop back to their original shape if they get stepped on

customer_reviews.title: They are 100% perfect for this use
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these cones for setting up practice maneuvers for a motorcycle, they are small enough to ride over them and they will bounce right back to their original shape. They are 100% perfect for this use. If anything they might slide on a windy day on a smooth blacktop parking lot. I would guess they would stay still if placed in grass on a breezy day. Anyway 100% satisfied, this product has multiple uses outside track and field.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Cyphers

customer_reviews.title: Great for making a drone racing course!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 of these to use for creating a drone racing course. I have only used them once but they seem to work wonderfully! I did have one cone so far that had a chunk taken out of it right out of the box. They are a bit light just placing them on the grass. You may have to work them in a bit so the prop wash from the propellers don't flip them over. Attached are photos of a quick little test course I set up in my backyard for one of my tiny whoop quads and my other racing drones.
customer_reviews.author: Hurricane Dave

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I’m using them for games for 4-7 year old for my soccer sessions. Now that I’ve seen the quality of the discs,stand and bag I’ll be ordering another set. I’m also recommending your products to the sports complex supply manager. I’m using outdoors right now but of course they will work just as well indoors this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: They feel a little cheaper than I had expected, but I think they will hold up against the kids that will be using them. There were plastic strands hanging off many of the cones (as if they came off of somebody's 3D printer) and the bag had lots of loose threads. I don't know how long the bag itself will last, but that's not why I purchased these so it's not a big deal. The cone holder seems well made. Overall, I think they are a good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Doyon

customer_reviews.title: Very flexible and slippery
customer_reviews.text: Value for these is worth it and getting a discount on a 3 pack order makes it better. The organizer and bag that come with it is great for keeping organized, or re-purposing for something else. Out of the box these cones were flimsy and very slippery, which makes it for a challenging task when carrying many of them in one hand, probably why they have the holder, which not something I use. The fact that they are flexible and lightweight makes them susceptible to flying away on their own with windy conditions. I prefer a slightly more heavy weight disc cone, but for the amount I got for cost. I can live with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Value
customer_reviews.text: They're small plastic cones, so it's not like there's a wide range of performance characteristics to assess! But this set is inexpensive for the good number of cones you get (lots of cones are particularly useful coaching 5-6 year olds, because they have trouble seeing/imagining lines if cones are more than a few feet apart). It's also a good combo of distinct colors. The base is made of pretty basic plastic (all I'd expect for the price), so it can be a little fragile. My base showed up broken, but the manufacturer replaced it free of charge within a couple days of receiving my complaint, so even that problem was quickly solved!
customer_reviews.author: D. H Smith

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and low visibility
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t expect to criticize this product, seems fairly fool proof. However, I’m looking at the cones side by side with another similarly priced brand from a local sporting goods store, and the difference is stark. These cones are paper thin, super flimsy, and semi translucent with poor visibility on grass. Total fail for something so basic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoff

customer_reviews.title: Flexible, durable and bright
customer_reviews.text: I have not been able to use these in my physical education classes yet as schools were closed soon after I ordered them. I like that they seem durable/flexible and I’m hoping they’ll hold up in cold weather. Our old, cheaply made ones cracked during play because of the cold temps. The colors seem brighter too and I hope they are more resistant to fading in the sun. 50 pack allows for multiple game areas and many game stations for larger classes. I can’t wait to replace our old, mismatched, broken ones. :)
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Disc Cones for Sports
customer_reviews.text: I bought the disc cones for a golf class that I teach and they are perfect for setting up distances. Taller cones would be affected by the wind. The bright colors show up against the grass and I needed a lot of cones so my 30 students could hit chip and pitch shots to figure out their distances. They are noticeable yet unobtrusive, and even if a ball hits them they are durable. A great value and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: nanjking

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition to the Training Kit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this kit because of the multi-colored cone inclusion. I'm teaching new high jumpers and long jumpers their approaches and instead of relying on dozens of tape marks, they each get their own color. It greatly simplifies the process and speeds up the learning curve. A handy bonus is that the handle is long enough for other cones I have so less for me to travel with. Product arrived on time and in great condition as well.
customer_reviews.author: CEL

customer_reviews.title: The holder and bag are a nice touch so that you can keep them easily together ...
customer_reviews.text: Cones are a bit light and don't always pop back into their original shape. However, for the price and quantity that is only a minor nitpick. The holder and bag are a nice touch so that you can keep them easily together for transporting or storage. I use the cones for agility drills in baseball as well as coning off 3 batting stations. The kids love all the different and bright colors.
customer_reviews.author: DowntownRDB

customer_reviews.title: Very Handy!
customer_reviews.text: Our club keeps a large supply of cones and discs in its equipment room, but I prefer these. They are large and flexible; they don't crack, even with my U14 girls tromping all over them. The stand/bag combo is nice because they inevitably get flipped over by kids throwing equipment into the back of the car. The bag is a nice quality; much nicer than I expected. They are heavier than my older discs which I like because they don't blow away as easily. I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LadyBiRDs

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't quite what I expected
customer_reviews.text: By looking at the picture, I mistakenly thought that it was a single cone with a handle. I thought "Great! I can use them as cavaletti posts for dog training by putting a PVC pipe through the handles". No. This picture shows 50 cones stacked on a single carrying handle. So it didn't quite meet my expectations. Still, they are very light, so if you step on them, you won't get hurt. I am using them as place markers. Unfortunately, some dogs are mistaking them for frisbees. Lol. Now, I need to buy what I was really looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Abramson

customer_reviews.title: Seem flimsy and handcut? but should work!
customer_reviews.text: The cones are very thin and the center hole is not cut uniformly, but they fit on the holster and should work as markers on the soccer field, so that's good enough for me! I really like the holder and the bag is nice and can be used as a satchel style carrier since it's connected at the top and bottom of the bag. The cone holder leaves plenty of room to add the cones I owned prior to this purchase. Overall I can recommend them. Have not yet tested the durability as I have only had them for less than a week.
customer_reviews.author: Geo

customer_reviews.title: Very useful, seem cheap but actually durable
customer_reviews.text: I used these for both U6 and U10 soccer teams. They proved very useful. Having two colors help provide opportunities for delineating a box with gates or other activities. They seem cheap and I thought I wanted some more “stuff” (hard plastic), however I think that makes them more likely to handle kids accidentally running over them with their cleats. I appreciate the mesh bag and post for storing and keeping them together.
customer_reviews.author: lowly developer

customer_reviews.title: Overall it’s a very solid product and great for its purpose.
customer_reviews.text: The amount of cones is definitely a plus and the assortment of colors can be useful. I used them for wheelchair basketball. They’re a little light and flimsy but that’s fine because there’s no wind indoors. Like the owner said if you double stack them you should be fine outdoors. The stand itself is really lightweight and could use a lower heavier center of gravity so it would be possible to give it a light toss without it knocking over (again I play wheelchair basketball so it’s a little difficult to bend down to pick things up and move them). Lastly, the bag is a great way to make sure the cones don’t go everywhere. Overall it’s a satisfying product!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander S.

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the cost.
customer_reviews.text: I oh tased these cones specifically for a “bad hop” drill for softball in hopes that they would work as planned. Unfortunately, individually they were not rigid enough to produce the desired result of a “bad hop”. Thankfully we bought the large quantity cone bundle and were able to quadruple them up to make them rigid enough to produce the desired effect. This is a nice set and I can see how they would be more effective as an actual cone for drills in case a player was to fall on them. They would be much more forgiving. Overall I am pleased with them and would probably buy them again if necessary
customer_reviews.author: Clint Hulliberger

customer_reviews.title: Very Light and pliable
customer_reviews.text: These are a great alternative to hard cones. No worries of kids stepping on them or falling on them. They do the job with no worries. They are a little light and I double them up on a windy day, but there is plenty of them for drills and such. The holder and sac keeps them well organized when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: F1

customer_reviews.title: Great cones and nice to have carrying case
customer_reviews.text: Great set of cones that stand up to a good bit of wear and tear. Coaching a U8 team of some first time learners means these got stepped on and kicked often. However none have split or cracked in any way and have retained their shape. The carrying stand and bag are appreciated to keep them organized and easy to throw into a ball bag and bring along. Would buy again if more were needed but 50 should be plenty!
customer_reviews.author: Shifty-Tips

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cone pattern motorcycle practice
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! After searching for cones that are lightweight and easily packable on a motorcycle, I came upon something thats everything I need. Slow speed manuevering on an 800+ lb motorcycle requires a lot of practice. These are easy to carry, quickly setup and align in a wide variety of patterns. I will be ordering more in a variety of colors soon. Their low profile means running them over brings no danger to the rider or very expensive motorcycle and they pop right back into shape.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Bordelon

customer_reviews.title: Simple cone, durable
customer_reviews.text: Great set of inexpensive cones for doing field work or in my case minibike course setups. If there was one complaint, these have a tendency to got mobile when the wind gets above 15 mph. These have been ridden over, knocked around and they are still holding up without any issues, which is why I bought a second set.
customer_reviews.author: moda_way

customer_reviews.title: Great for crime scenes.
customer_reviews.text: I work third shift for a police department and I bought these to use at crime scenes. I place them over shell casings and anything else that needs to be documented. This keeps anyone from driving or stepping on something and keeps me from having to re-find everything. Blood washes off of them pretty easily. My kids use them for soccer drills sometimes as well.
customer_reviews.author: Natec882

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids drills
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for soccer and man are the great! Having different drills in different colors is so useful! Top it off with them being very durable and lightweight. My only complaint is that there are only 10 of each color. I would love to have a 100 pack of these with 20 of each.
customer_reviews.author: ElMusago

customer_reviews.title: Very thin, flimsy and do not hold shape
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed with this product. It appears to be a similar product to what many of our other coaches disc cones in our area are using, however, the ones I ordered from you are very thin, flimsy and do not hold their shape when separated from the stack. I definitely wish I would have just purchased some locally so I could have inspected the quality before making the purchase. I would not recommend these to other coaches who are looking for quality equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great Product....Awesome Performance!!
customer_reviews.text: These cones are an excellent choice for an organization looking for cones that are reasonably priced. The cones are brightly colored and are easily visible on the field. During drills, the cones do not easily flip over when hit by a ball or accidentally kicked by a player. The cones have also held up well when the breeze picks up. They do not fly away or tip over. The storage of the cones is also well thought out. They transport easy and are a small footprint for storage. I would recommend this product as it has served me well on the field. I was not compensated for this review.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Takes a beating!!!
customer_reviews.text: Are use these cones at my family reunion for a game and they were trampled on and thrown around and they are in perfect condition after words. I felt that they were a little expensive but you pay for what you get. Would definitely suggest these for anyone looking for a durable product.
customer_reviews.author: Sherie Covell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for field, beach, and gym.
customer_reviews.text: Other than the lightweight material, these cones are perfect. The bright colors are ideal for visibility. The only negative is the lightweight material. On a windy day, these cones tend to blow out of place rather easily. Other than that I think they're great!
customer_reviews.author: Everett Blanton

customer_reviews.title: Super flimsy but gets job done for now
customer_reviews.text: Super flimsy but will get the job done. I've got 2 other sets of disc cones from other brands. Compared to those these are really thin. I can see them losing their shape after repeated ball and athlete abuse. But it works for now. And I do like the carrier. Much easier to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: coleyh8

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t Get My Ebook
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t get the ebook as promised. You get a piece of paper telling you to go to a website to download - the problem is the site is no longer active. So I based my purchased based on what I thought I was receiving and didn’t get all of it.
customer_reviews.author: JessicaD-84

customer_reviews.title: Nice cones! Perfect for everyday athletic use
customer_reviews.text: These cones are perfect for setting up mountain bike technical training courses because they’re soft and flexible so you can run them over and it doesn’t get in the way of anything. I’ll definitely be getting more of these and see what else I can use them for.
customer_reviews.author: BadKarma8049

customer_reviews.title: Super flimsy -- not worth it
customer_reviews.text: The cones are just too flimsy. They blow over easily. I need to use at least two in one spot to provide any decent definition or shape to the cone itself. I would NOT recommend to anyone. Spend some more money and get thicker plastic cones. The carrying case is decent, and I like the multi colors. That is why it didn't get one star.
customer_reviews.author: D. Babcock

customer_reviews.title: Mine didn't come with the "Durable Plastic Cone Caddy"
customer_reviews.text: These seem like great economic practice cones for the money. My only complaint is that mine didn't come with the "Durable Plastic Cone Caddy." That's not a huge deal, but since it specifically specifies that as part of the item description, it should definitely be included.
customer_reviews.author: C. Becker

customer_reviews.title: Very light cones
customer_reviews.text: Very light cones that flatten very easily. I think this as a plus for flag football practice as kids do not trip on them as easy as the very hard cones that have the high peak. Wish they had a little more to them though as wind or quick brush bys will turn them over easily. Orange is a good bright orange with a tad bit of shine. Love the storage and handle. I’m a 3.5/5 here.
customer_reviews.author: Ctb21

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: Used theseto make straight backing, off set and alley dock lanes. I had to practice for Class A license and didn't pay a school. Yes I passed Very visible and good price. Would work great for it's intended purpose and worked great for me. If windy I don't think these are heavy enough.
customer_reviews.author: J. Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Works well for horseback riding pattern markers
customer_reviews.text: These cones are a little thinner than I expected but are holding up well so far. I’ve been using them in the horse arena for pattern work. Its nice that my horse can accidentally step on them and they stay put so I don’t have to keep getting on and off to set them back up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very thin and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: These cones are so thin that one just of wind will blow them away! A am returning them for a refund. The price is great as long as you don't intend to use these cones outside with any wind or nobody steps on them!
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: They are bright yellow easy to see and very durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for two purposes, basketball training and to set up drone racing track. They are bright yellow easy to see and very durable! The bonus mesh that comes with this set up is very well needed especially if you carry them in a bag or car trunk. definitely, recommend these, and I'm sure the other colors they offer are just as bright and good quality as these
customer_reviews.author: Sergio19

customer_reviews.title: Disc Cones are perfect for Tennis Agility...for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: These cones were purchased for my fitness/tennis coach who uses them for his fitness classes, private and clinic tennis lessons. They were purchased as a surprise/gift for him (and us) and he was thrilled! After my private lesson this morning, he used the cones for his next student, an 8 year-old, for his agility movements before hitting the ball...I’m only 76 so you can see your cones are used for ALL ages, and for purposes other than soccer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I use these cones to setup motorcycle obstacle courses. They fit this role perfectly. They are light weight so I can throw them in my panniers, easy to see and flexible. I've run over a couple of them but they bounce right back to shape and don't even leave marks. I can't imagine how they could be any better.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Ruhnke

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids and for practicing with my motorcycle
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to be able to do slow maneuver practice with my motorcycle. I also use them for the kids for games. They are great, when I run over them they pop right back up. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: J.P.

customer_reviews.title: Thin like paper.
customer_reviews.text: Thin like paper ,Bought it for my kids soccer practice. The bright color is the only plus.
customer_reviews.author: Nounou

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great company!
customer_reviews.text: Complete package that comes with everything you need - the cones, the holder, a carrying bag, and an ebook of agility drills. The product itself is exactly what I was looking for and what I expected. It's quite practical that they email the ebook, since I probably would have just thrown away a paper insert without looking at it. Follow up emails from the company to make sure that I was satisfied was a nice touch as well!
customer_reviews.author: Jon G

customer_reviews.title: We Are very happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: We Are very happy with the product, nice bright colors, great mesh bag. The whistle was missing though, I read other reviews and the same thing happened to them. I emailed the vendor just haven't heard back. Other than that you'll be happy, great price👍🏼I have to change my review, the seller did end up gettingback to me and has offered 25% off of the purchase price. That was very nice🙌🏼
customer_reviews.author: irenedooley

customer_reviews.title: Good for making numbered cones
customer_reviews.text: I simply flipped these guys inside out (so that the nontextured side is on the outside) and attached number stickers to them. Easy numbers for dog agility courses! Plus now I have enough cones to make a few more sets.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Nice cones...BUT...Didn't receive all of them....
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered these for my daughter for soccer practices, and I was going through and initialing it sends more than one player on her team has these for practice. Well after counting on 3 times I notice that I only received 49 out of the 50! Sure only getting 49 ISN'T a huge deal, but still I paid for 50 and expected to get 50. O should've counted it BEFORE I initialed them. So I won't be able to return them. ANYWAYS, other than that they are very nice! My ONLY suggestion to those who order them and NEED 50, count them...
customer_reviews.author: Alaska_Mike

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for running soccer drills. The carrying case and storage bar make transport easy and efficient. They are a little on the lightweight side, so if knocked theybwill move or blow over, but for the quantity and price you can easily overlook this. Also for smaller groups, double stacking Kees cones in place better.
customer_reviews.author: Ali H.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to use as passes at school. Something bright, easy to clean, easy to carry, hard to break, and hard to "accidentally" keep. They are perfect! Based on other comments I expected them to be a rubber-type of flexible, but it's more like thin, stiff plastic. Doesn't make a difference to me but it might for someone else looking for a softer matieral.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Pro Disc Cones
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product for your child (children) if they are going to be involved with any sports or outdoor activities. Used them to set up a track for training for a bike race. Will use them as children get older for sports drills. Durable as well. Very practical as well. The storage cone/carrying handle and bag are awesome for storage. Makes it real easy for kids (even 4 year olds) to pick up. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BookLover

customer_reviews.title: Great low-height cones for Soccer Drills
customer_reviews.text: I love that they come with a cone holder/stand and bag. They are perfect for quickly setting up drills and marking off sections of the field. And the price was right on for the great quality of the cones.
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: I did receive the cones and they were perfect for the clinic my team was hosting
customer_reviews.text: I did receive the cones and they were perfect for the clinic my team was hosting. The bag was also very convenient for carrying the cones. Haven't utilized the whistle yet, however I'm sure it's great. I also received the pdf of the drills and I am excited to get to utilize them this season. It's a very great set for a great cost. Worked well for the rugby camp my team hosted
customer_reviews.author: spearj

customer_reviews.title: Solid cones
customer_reviews.text: 1. Cones are nice and bright. 2. Like the holder that they come with, just not sure how long it will last in the long-term. 3. Excellent customer service, they have checked back with me a couple times to make sure everything is okay.
customer_reviews.author: excited father

customer_reviews.title: Easy to spot
customer_reviews.text: These are colorful and easy to spot in the park on grass, a bit flimsy since it's pretty thin but it was perfect to set up the balls on for dodgeball/sham battle. Also happy that it came with a little bag something to put it on, I just stacked it together with my other cones and it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very useful!
customer_reviews.text: We used these for a 4th of July party to mark parking spots on our huge gravel driveway. Worked gr8. Those that parked wrong just drove over them w/o any damage - no damage to the cones or the tires!
customer_reviews.author: Buffunny

customer_reviews.title: Great product for great price!
customer_reviews.text: This comes with 50 cones stacked on a little holder and a mesh bag with a toggle for carrying. Bought for my 9 year old who loves agility training. So they are being set up around the house for basketball drills. I would reccomend this product! Lots for a good price!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Golding

customer_reviews.title: cones are great
customer_reviews.text: the cones are great. love all the colors. The storage rack works fine, but they can fall off when not in a bag. Speaking of that the storage bag they come with is not durable and will have to find some other way of storing them long term.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for motorcycle skill drills!
customer_reviews.text: I use these cones for practicing drills on my motorcycle. They collapse nicely if ran over and they lay fly enough not to cause any issues if ran over. Perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: EDC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Disc Cones at a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these disc cones to help coach a young girls field hockey team. I was very happy with the quality and price of them. Shipping was super fast too! I highly recommend them! A+++
customer_reviews.author: Rei and Zoe's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: nice set of cones and Profect is easy to deal with
customer_reviews.text: good product and good service. The multi colored cones are great for marking different areas during drills. The holder and bag are handy for keeping things together. There is also room for another 20 cones or so. A little hang up with getting the wrong cones delivered, but Profect fixed it quick and without any hassle.
customer_reviews.author: mrjoedave

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a new coach.
customer_reviews.text: These cones are durable and are a good value for the price. They were the perfect purchase for the 1st time U6 coach. This kit should last me for a long time, and with three young boys it needs to.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Good cones
customer_reviews.text: Cones are great. The bag it comes in falls apart right away
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I use these for making temporary quadcopter race courses. A bit thinner and more flexible than I expected but that's not a bad thing. A stack of 50 of these gets marginally heavy. 100% satisfied! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Tristan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, great service.
customer_reviews.text: Good deal for this many cones, fast shipping, great service. I use them for coaching Ice hockey - they are a lot easier than using the tall cones (much cheaper and harder for the kids to knock 'em over, but they can still send them flying).
customer_reviews.author: robyrob

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift-hasn’t been given yet but they are exactly as described and will be PERFECT for backyard or field practice! Speedy delivery. Good seller, hope tonnees lorw soccer gear soon so i can order more from seller.
customer_reviews.author: jbgmomma

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for practicing soccer moves
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these agility cones for my grandson for practicing soccer moves. The orange color is easy to see on the yard and the holder and bag make for easy transport and storage.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Ed

customer_reviews.title: Great Set for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Work Perfect for what they're supposed to do. The bright colors make them easily visible on sunny days or when it starts to get dark. They're very lightweight and may need to be double stacked on windy days but otherwise stay in place well. They work on various surfaces such as grass or hardwood floors. They're pretty durable, holding their shape well even when being stepped on, they usually return to their normal shape.
customer_reviews.author: Brock Frisbie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality cones for training
customer_reviews.text: I use these cones for agility training for football and so far I cannot say that I'm displeased about anything. You get 50 high quality yellow cones that come in a drawstring bag that is easy to carry. If it is windy, just stack them on each other and they won't move an inch. I ordered these and was supposed to get them within seven days but got them four days early which is also a plus. I look forward to purchasing more products from this company in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Really like them. Multiple colors enables you to set up lanes when you are teaching new players how to work in zones and not all go to the ball. Good fore skili training also.
customer_reviews.author: B Butler

customer_reviews.title: Great product for coaching youth teams
customer_reviews.text: The disks are much thiner than expected but this gives it really good flexibility. The U9 youth team i coach has been stepping on them and nothing has happened so far. I can see that excessive exposure to the sun may dry up the plastic and then we might be able to see breaks, vut at the moment nothing has happend and the product is great.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Carranza

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but not great.
customer_reviews.text: These are probably fine for use in sports fields, but if used in a parking lot, they don’t like being driven over at all. They are more of a thin plastic than a flexible silicon/rubber style plastic. They are ok, but not great.
customer_reviews.author: Owen Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Soccer coach
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They are easy to carry around and throw out on the ground. Very durable the girls step on them all the time they are still in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Seem good quality and I like having a way to keep ...
customer_reviews.text: They are cones. Seem good quality and I like having a way to keep them all together with the bag that seems well made. I would recommend over some other cones that I have bought as these don't seem as thin.
customer_reviews.author: AGuyInTX

customer_reviews.title: Great disc cones
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had the cones long enough to address durability, but they look like they will be sturdy. They were an excellent value and I got them quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Portable
customer_reviews.text: Got these for work, marking floor spots in warehouses, these are relatively lightweight, small, easy to see but professional looking. They're also quite flexible, so I'd imagine you could step on or run them over and they wouldn't crack.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Sopko

customer_reviews.title: serve the purpose just fine
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for teaching ball handling skills for your youngest soccer player. Only wish I would’ve gotten the colors I ordered
customer_reviews.author: someoneelse

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Received the cones, love the net carrying case and cone holder but the cones themselves are very thin. Used them for a high school soccer training session and one step on them and they not only loose their shape and become bent but in fact a cleat put a hole in one of the cones. Great for a low cost youth team but will not last for older levels...
customer_reviews.author: Jason C.

customer_reviews.title: Cones used to setup training course for motorcycles
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to practice my motorcycle maneuvers. If I mess up and run over one no problems bounces right back.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest W. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: price/quality balance
customer_reviews.text: I want the cones for rough use so I was looking for a cheap option which can help me in the flag football with my friends, this option si very balanced in the cost/quality ratio.
customer_reviews.author: gerardoahuatzin

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and value! Cones are used to mark drills for a youth mountain biking team. They easy to separate and stack. Stores nicely in the mesh bag that was included. Will definitely buy again as our team expands.
customer_reviews.author: Dupdedo

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but expensive cost
customer_reviews.text: It came and it was very flimsy. Thought they were more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: I got this item for my son based on number of reviews gave it high ratings , but I was so disappointed today when I got them, they are so thin and the bag is already ripped and I need to use a different carrying bag for them
customer_reviews.author: L.A

customer_reviews.title: Durable, yet lightweight. Love the bag.
customer_reviews.text: Have used cones for many ultimate frisbee games. They've been stepped on and have kept their form. Love the carrying bag!!! Whole reason I got them was for the transportabiliy. Bag has been durable.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product for outdoor exercises!
customer_reviews.text: Product works exactly as it is suppose to. Great for exercises in all environments. Only annoying thing was the sticker on the top cone. The sticker is very annoying to take off and difficult to get rid of all the adhesive.
customer_reviews.author: Chesapeake

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Carrying handle and size makes this very convenient. Much better than trying to use a stack of full size cones as we did when I was a child playing soccer. I am able to fit the entire thing inside the ball bag and make only one trip from the vehicle to the field
customer_reviews.author: William Heitzman

customer_reviews.title: ... haven't used this yet but they look to be good quality. I especially like that they come with ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this yet but they look to be good quality. I especially like that they come with a booklet of drills to do. I'll update this review if my opinion changes once I use them.
customer_reviews.author: Hswilliams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set of cones!
customer_reviews.text: These are high quality cones and the set includes all of the extras. Comes with the rack to store them on and a nice bag for transport. The company also e-mailed me a sweet PDF document of agility workouts that can be done using the cone. To top it all off, they even included a coaches whistle in the box lol.
customer_reviews.author: JasonE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dribbling drills at basketball practice.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for dribbling drills at basketball practice. They’re easy to carry around and are very helpful for drills.
customer_reviews.author: icanthruchrist

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sports and kids
customer_reviews.text: These cones are perfect for sports activities with kids. Big with bright colors. Durable to handle being stepped on. Great purchase. I just wish I bought more colors
customer_reviews.author: bribold1

customer_reviews.title: Soccer cones
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly as advertised ...timely delivery...shipping packaging was very good I would recommend these cones to all soccer coaches or soccer people looking for them
customer_reviews.author: Clive

customer_reviews.title: Cones are great just don’t Expect the holder to be In one piece
customer_reviews.text: The cones are just what I wanted, the Stack and Carrie option would have been great as well but it was broken when I pull it out of the box
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Good price for quantity and quality
customer_reviews.text: Cones look good. Yellow and orange colors are visible and sharp. Quality appears good. I cannot tell you their durability until Im coaching soccer again in a few weeks, but A ok so far!
customer_reviews.author: gil roraback

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these cones for motorcycle practice. They are made of soft material, the bike is not sliding on them when I run over them and they get back to the original shape. Great color, very visible, perfect size. They come with a carrying bag, which makes them easy to carry and store. Shipping was very fast, and Zach send me a very comprehensive email with detailed instructions and agility exercises. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Toma

customer_reviews.title: convenient and easy
customer_reviews.text: These cones are great, easy to carry with both a holder and bag. The bonus of the drills PDF is a really good addition!
customer_reviews.author: DMTCR

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what it says. The cones are perfect for youth soccer. The stacking handle is a nice touch. It comes with a net, which isn't all that necessary as the cones don't fall off of the handle. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Drewsquire

customer_reviews.title: U-17 Player Loves Them for Independent Practice
customer_reviews.text: My grandson wanted these for his birthday so he could go to the park and practice. He sent me a text they day after he received to say he had been to the park and loved the cones!
customer_reviews.author: Ms patti

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: These disc's are a great value and the carry bag makes it convenient to transport them from home to practice.
customer_reviews.author: JLH

customer_reviews.title: Great for race path markers.
customer_reviews.text: Using for FPV Quadcopter/Drone Racing practice. Made my own gates and use these in between the gates to mark the course path. Very visible.
customer_reviews.author: ztiger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hockey
customer_reviews.text: Bought for hockey practices and they are exactly what I was looking for. The cones are a flexible rubbery plastic and super lightweight. If a kid decides to kick one or hit one with his stick they only move a couple of feet because they are so lightweight. The hard plastic ones will fly across the ice.
customer_reviews.author: BradfordJ

customer_reviews.title: USSFRP Refree Training cones
customer_reviews.text: Love the amount of cones for the price. Eeverything feels high quality, hope it last for a very time. I noticed there are 51 cones, labeled every cone from 1 to 50 and noticed an extra cone. Hope to use for training asap, soccer referee training. I bought the cones to set up drills and courses to work on different types of movement and conditioning and speed as a referee
customer_reviews.author: Jmrodriguez97

customer_reviews.title: Count your cones
customer_reviews.text: The product is packaged amazingly and it seems to be high quality. We received this product 07APR19 and I’m writing this review the same day. The only issue is, and this is trivial at best, we received 49/50 cones.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Good product light weight and durable but i gave it 2 stars cause i ordered blue and red amd got only orange. Update : contacted the supplier and was sent the exact one i ordered (blue and red )I was allowed to keep the first set quick customer service i know give them 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: slickrick

product_meta.title: Pro Disc Cones (Set of 50) - Agility Soccer Cones with Carry Bag and Holder for Training, Football, Kids, Sports, Field Cone Markers - Includes Top 15 Drills eBook
feature_bullets: ULTIMATE TRAINING SET – The only agility disc cone set that includes 50 Pro Disc Cones, mesh carrying bag, cone holder, and Bonus "Top 15 Speed and Agility Cone Drills" eBook.

BUILT TO LAST – Durable and flexible. Our long-lasting soccer cones will bounce back after getting stepped on, kicked, and run over season after season. Great as boundary markers, sport practice, and targets.

HIGH VISIBILITY COLORS – Bright, easy-to-see colors with UV protection to clearly mark anything. On the field, court, gym, track, sidelines, or parking lot. A great gift idea for kids, coaches, athletes, or anyone else who loves sports!

UNMATCHED QUALITY – Our premium, soft, low-profile sport cones are approved by coaches, kids and parents. Ideal for soccer training equipment, coaching, drills, practice, football, basketball, dribbling, obstacle courses, or even drone racing gates.
100% MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE – Profect Sports offers a 100% guarantee that you are fully satisfied with your Pro Disc Cones or receive your money back. Hit "Add To Cart" now.
